entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
